titles.title: To ensure pay parity for Federal employees serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst.
To ensure pay parity for Federal employees serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Requires the pay schedules and rates to be used for purposes of any determination of pay for a federal employee serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst to be the same as if such employee were serving in the pay locality, wage area, or other area or locality that includes Ocean County, New Jersey.
